actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 502 of the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to provide for loans for plant acquisition, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Small Business Administration to make loans for plant acquisition. States that loans made for the purpose of acquiring real property and constructing improvements thereon shall have a maturity of twenty years. Limits the maturity of other loans to 10 years.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 502 of the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to provide for loans for plant acquisition, and for other purposes.
